Title: Samson
Writer: Kazimierz Brandys (novel), Kazimierz Brandys (screenplay), Andrzej Wajda
Actors: Serge Merlin, Alina Janowska, Elzbieta Kepinska, Jan Ciecierski
Plot: During the Nazi occupation, Jewish prisoner Jakub Gold is released from jail and works as a gravedigger in the Warsaw ghetto. Although he manages to escape and keeps hiding in private apartments, he tries to get back to the ghetto.
